basics.name: Ethan Smith
basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.summary: Passionate Software engineer with 3+ years of experience working on a variety of systems in highly regulated industries. My passion is education and the free sharing of knowledge and I am eager to apply that passion to my career. I love to teach and broaden my knowledge and want to provide opportunities for everyone to do the same.

work.summary: Develop solutions on and administer the enterprise SharePoint and Power Platform SaaS offerings
highlights: Facilitate monthly tech forums for off-shore and on-shore teams to connect on technical concepts
Host daily office hours to troubleshoot users' issues and advise on best practices for SharePoint use and development
Refined my skills in Angular, Agile, Transact SQL, and Java Spring as a LEAP candidate
Mentor and provide technical guidance for interns
Repeatedly served as my agile team's scrum master while still performing daily development tasks
Created self service solutions with React and Microsoft's SPFx framework
Implemented a more secure credential protocol for automated PowerShell scripts
Automated multiple processes to ensure SEC Rule 17a-4(f) compliance
Employed industry standard practices to facilitate easy code sharing and reuse for our large PowerShell script repertoire

work.summary: Worked in an Agile scrum team to perform daily development tasks
highlights: Utilized TDD to identify bugs and refactor Forex order processing code, increasing efficiency by 300%
Updated the Forex order form and order processing capabilities according to user feedback

work.summary: Instructed upcoming and current high school students in core computer science concepts
highlights: Recognized as one of the top 5% performing counselors nationwide

work.summary: Refereed town and club youth soccer for age groups U8 through U18
Scrutinized pieces from machines to ensure compliance with stringent automobile and aerospace industry standards

volunteer.summary: Assistant soccer coach for girls U14 soccer team. I ran drills during practice and managed the team during games.
